data.name: Dark Zasasa.com
Minimal MyAnimeList (MAL)
data.description: Removes all the unessisary crap like rating, reviews, clubs, etc. Use MAL as an anime tracker without all the extra garbage. Uses: "Hide MAL Scores and other things (UPDATED)" and "Remove Blue Footer (MyAnimelist social media)" + my own new stuff to get the job done. So check those out if you want any of that specific stuff.

data.name: TechHive Dark by BamaBraves
Hide MAL Scores and other things (UPDATED)
data.description: Updated version of "Hide MAL Scores and other things". I've fixed all the broken stuff and added some more stuff. So this should be all you need to remove all the annoying stuff (e.g. score, ranking, reviews). But what if (you) want some of that crap (e.g. want reviews)?? It's all commented, so you just delete the section you don't want. It's all super easy.

data.name: SupraForums Streamlined
data.description:
SupraForums went to a new platform on June 13th, 2019.  This resulted in a significantly different style, which a lot of users don't like.  This Stylish style makes better use of a desktop browser's screen and removes a lot of superfluous stuff that seasoned users don't want to see.

Created by SupraForums user "bitshftr".
